data.name: Plunger Simulator
data.detailed_description: This game is the crappiest game you have ever played. Plunge into the depths of toilets to eradicate the faceless turds that threaten the face-full turds and all they stand for. Go through six different, but very original restaurants defeating the horrors that live within the bathroom using only your plunger. Once the turd is far enough down the pipe, flush the toilet to finish it off. Be careful, some turds will pop back up for more, and if the turd is too big when you flush, it will overflow the toilet!
data.about_the_game: This game is the crappiest game you have ever played. Plunge into the depths of toilets to eradicate the faceless turds that threaten the face-full turds and all they stand for. Go through six different, but very original restaurants defeating the horrors that live within the bathroom using only your plunger. Once the turd is far enough down the pipe, flush the toilet to finish it off. Be careful, some turds will pop back up for more, and if the turd is too big when you flush, it will overflow the toilet!
data.short_description: Plunger simulator is a very relatable simulator. Plunge the turds down into the watery depths below with your trusty plunger, then flush to finish them off. Be careful, the turds like to pop back up, and can cause a toilet to overflow!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 475 MB available space
  • Sound Card: basic sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 475 MB available space
  • Sound Card: basic sound
